page.title: 02QUESTIONS & ANSWERS
page.content: {1 When did you start building? The foundation was started in January 1984,six months later the building was started. {2 How long has it taken to build? It has taken 10 months to build. {3 How many people were employed on it? Thirty tradesmen each spent 2 months on it. {4 How many square feet? Internal floor area 4,500 square feet. {5 What materials were used?} Traditional materials-brick,timber, clay and asbestos. {6 Anything special about it-the Wall? The backbone of the building is a garden wall on which the stucture is supported. {7 What are the red circular discs? They are an architectural feature with purpose of connecting timber to metal. All metal members are painted red.
